CredentialsContainerCreate.summary: The create() method of the interface creates a new {{glossary("credential")}}, which can then be stored and later retrieved using the method. The retrieved credential can then be used by a website to authenticate a user.

remarks.para: This method supports three different types of credential:
Note that the Federated Credential Management API (FedCM) supersedes the federated credential type.

CredentialsContainerCreate.returns: A that resolves with one of the following:If no credential object can be created, the promise resolves with null.
